mapper.select: SELECT day_tour_id as dayTourId, day_tour_id as id, name, location, description, price, duration, rating, image_url as imageUrl, category, is_active as isActive, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, region_id as regionId, departure_address as departureAddress, guide_fee as guideFee, guide_id as guideId FROM day_tours WHERE day_tour_id = #{id}

SELECT dt.day_tour_id as id, dt.day_tour_id as dayTourId, dt.name, dt.description, dt.price, dt.duration, dt.location, dt.departure_address, dt.guide_fee, dt.rating, dt.region_id, dt.category, dt.image_url as cover_image, r.name as region_name FROM day_tours dt LEFT JOIN regions r ON dt.region_id = r.region_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT day_tour_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating, COUNT(*) as review_count FROM reviews WHERE day_tour_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY day_tour_id ) rv ON dt.day_tour_id = rv.day_tour_id ORDER BY rv.avg_rating DESC, rv.review_count DESC, dt.day_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT dt.day_tour_id as id, dt.day_tour_id as dayTourId, dt.name, dt.description, dt.price, dt.duration, dt.location, dt.departure_address, dt.guide_fee, dt.rating, dt.region_id, dt.category, dt.image_url as cover_image, r.name as region_name FROM day_tours dt LEFT JOIN regions r ON dt.region_id = r.region_id ORDER BY dt.day_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
